summary: I am passionate about helping businesses bring their product visions to life. With over 25 years of experience in product development, manufacturing, and sourcing, I have had the privilege of working with leading brands across North America, helping them create and launch successful product lines from start to finish. As the founder of InterConcept Inc. and Menn√§ Life, I have guided numerous businesses through the complexities of sourcing, design, and production, ensuring they have high-quality products that resonate with their target audience. From concept development and private labeling to global sourcing and manufacturing logistics, I provide comprehensive solutions that make the entire process seamless. In addition, I act as a local agent for overseas manufacturing, bridging the gap between brands and international suppliers. I ensure that every step of the process‚Äîfrom sourcing materials to final production‚Äîis handled with precision and care, providing you with peace of mind that your product is being developed efficiently and to the highest standards. Whether you're an emerging startup looking to develop your first product or an established brand seeking to expand your line, I offer the expertise, network, and strategic insight needed to deliver results. In addition to my product development work, I am also a certified life coach specializing in energy healing. I teach individuals how to access their inner world of energy awareness and use this awareness to self-discover their outer material world. If you're not using energy consciously, you're only living with half of yourself. My coaching empowers clients to live fully, aligning their personal and professional lives for lasting balance and fulfillment. Let‚Äôs work together to create something extraordinary for your brand. Reach out today to discuss how I can support your product development journey or personal growth.
job description: Coaching is the bridge between where you are now and where you want to be‚Äîa powerful tool for creating real, lasting change. While change is inevitable, we often resist the unknown. Everyone has unique abilities, interests, and talents, but sometimes it‚Äôs hard to recognize them within ourselves. My coaching process focuses on aligning your goals with your true purpose, starting from within. I also integrate energy healing and somatic stress release techniques into my coaching to help you not only navigate life‚Äôs changes but to improve your relationships, deepen your spiritual connection, and increase your presence, happiness, and impact in the world. Together, we‚Äôll clear away the noise and pressure of outside expectations, so you can gain clarity on how you truly want your life to feel. Whether you‚Äôre seeking to shift the direction of your life, break free from self-sabotage, or heal your relationship with your body, we‚Äôll peel back the layers and rebuild for a stronger, more joyful life. My mission is to make energy work and higher awareness accessible to everyone‚Äîso we can let go of unnecessary conflict and pain and embrace lives of passion, purpose, and true fulfillment. Message me for a free 15-minute discovery call!

summary: Strategy breaks down when conditions change faster than plans. I help leaders and organizations navigate complexity when the path forward isn‚Äôt fully visible ‚Äî strengthening judgment, sense-making, and decision-making as the terrain shifts. My work sits at the intersection of strategy, leadership, and human judgment. I support organizations facing high-stakes decisions shaped by uncertainty, competing priorities, organizational change, and rapid technology shifts ‚Äî including AI. Through 8Ball Clarity, I work with leadership teams on strategic clarity, decision-making, and alignment when execution alone isn‚Äôt the problem. My role is to slow thinking down just enough to create clarity ‚Äî and then help people move forward with confidence. As a Fractional Chief Strategy Officer with Scarlett Nova, I help organizations move from AI curiosity to responsible, value-creating adoption. This includes shaping AI strategy, governance, and decision frameworks that account for human readiness, risk, timing, and system-level impact ‚Äî not just tools. I‚Äôm an engineer-turned-people executive and strategist, with experience spanning manufacturing, supply chain, enterprise risk, digital transformation, and organizational development. I‚Äôm industry-agnostic by design, enabling cross-pollination of insight across systems. I also host The Generalist Advantage podcast because the world needs more of their superpowers. What clients value most: ‚úÖ Clearer decisions in complex situations ‚úÖ Stronger alignment across diverse stakeholders ‚úÖ Momentum without oversimplifying reality Fluent in English and French. Generalist by nature. Strategist by practice. Deep believer that good judgment is the most underdeveloped capability of our time. Random fact: my passport proudly displays stamps from 40+ countries. üåé Talk to me about #Strategy #AIAdoption #criticalthinking #Generalists

summary: With a doctorate in clinical psychology and extensive studies, experience, and practice in corporate coaching and consultancy, Dr. Andy Garrett is at the forefront of a revolutionary movement towards personal growth and optimization. He earned his doctoral degree from the Graduate Psychology program at Azusa Pacific University. Their theoretical emphasis on Systems theory and unique holistic integration philosophy helped him to become very effective in conceptualizing and implementing strategic growth plans for individuals, families, and corporations. Dr. Andy uniquely emphasizes a positive psychology approach that utilizes established individual, familial, and organizational strengths rather than underscoring what may be pathological or dysfunctional. In blending this approach with a systems theoretical model, existential psychology, and solution-focused strategies, he's empowered to provide a transformative brand of coaching and consulting. Throughout his career, he‚Äôs contributed a significant and meaningful role as a consultant for multiple faith-based organizations - where he specializes in empowering his clients to discover and establish their True North identity, purpose, and community - and then integrate radically resilient principles, practices, and strategies - that enable his clients to consistently achieve their biggest goals and actualize their greatest potential. Dr. Andy has made a considerable impact working as a performance coach for high performing executives, elite athletes, and organizations throughout Southern California - and beyond (his online coaching curriculum has been effectively utilized and taught throughout the US - and even in select European countries). Dr. Andy has developed a thriving private practice in the renowned Newport Beach area, and he offers custom private workshops, corporate training programs, he is a highly sought after speaker and podcast guest, and he continues to offer concierge style coaching services (although - openings with Dr. Andy are rare to come by - so, if you are interested in working with him one on one - you should get on his waiting list ASAP!).

job description (2): Have developed and am leading an innovative, ethical, and highly efficacious private practice that empowers clients and clinicians to become their personal best and thrive. This practice is very goal oriented and solution based - with the intent of providing an environment that is actively collaborative and is focused on ensuring that clients reach (and exceed) all of their treatment and life objectives. This practice was created with the purpose of identifying clients that are motivated to grow - and offers customized growth plans that will inspire confidence and optimize the clients time and efforts and ultimately empowers clients, families, and organizations to Thrive by Design. While Dr. Andy and his team at AG Thrive are very effective and experienced in treating anxiety, depression, relationship challenges, familial conflict, etc., the primary goal and objective at AG Thrive is to help clients create and grow a quality of life that is extraordinary.
job description (3): Providing clinical services for children, adolescents, adults, geriatrics, couples, and families in an outpatient private practice setting. Client‚Äôs are referred for issues concerning depression, anxiety, family problems, relational struggles, premarital preparation, marriage counseling, academic struggles, drug and alcohol dependency, eating and body image issues, cutting, anger management, and various interpersonal and intrapersonal afflictions. Therapeutic interventions included individual therapy (CBT, client-centered, and/or IPT), group therapy, didactic therapy, couples and family counseling.
job description (4): Thank you for taking the opportunity to get to know me and my approach to psychotherapy. My name is Andy Garrett (my patient‚Äôs typically refer to me as Dr. G or Dr. Andy) and I am excited to be joining the Connolly Counseling Group practice. As a clinician ‚Äì I believe that therapy should help you access the best part of yourself, enhance the overall quality and sense of satisfaction in your life, and remove the emotional barriers that are holding you back from achieving your goals. In this process you will gain the capacity and confidence to establish relationships that are meaningful, fulfilling, and lasting. Over the course of completing my doctoral studies and clinical training at Azusa Pacific University ‚Äì I developed a unique style of psychotherapy which has proven to be highly effective. I have worked in some of the most reputable psychiatric hospitals, outpatient clinics, educational institutions, and private practice settings in Southern California. These opportunities have allowed me the privilege of working with a diverse population of adolescents, adults, couples, and families. I have developed specific interests and training in treating psychological issues that include anxiety, depression, life transitions, addictions (including substance abuse related issues, food addictions, and compulsive gambling), faith/religious distress, and grief. I can also provide psychological testing services for diagnostic purposes, academic testing, premarital enrichment, and occupational enhancement. In summary, it would be my privilege to join you on your journey towards self-discovery and personal growth. In the process you will experience a collaborative relationship that is both supportive and affirming‚Äìand I will help you achieve the absolute best quality of life that you truly deserve. In taking that courageous first step and reaching out for help, you can change the course of your life forever‚Ä¶and for the better! Supervisor: Bob Connolly, Psy.D.

summary: Running a growing business means juggling people issues, compliance rules, and constant change‚Äîoften without a real HR department. That is where a fractional HR partner becomes essential, not optional.As founder of NavigationHR, a fractional HR consulting firm, I help small and mid‚Äësized employers build simple, compliant HR systems that reduce risk, prevent fires, and free owners to focus on revenue and clients‚Äînot handbooks, investigations, or leave tracking.With over a decade in HR leadership and more than twenty years as an attorney focused on litigation and regulatory compliance, I specialize in translating dense HR and employment law requirements into practical, repeatable processes your managers can actually use. That includes risk audits, policy and handbook rebuilds, employee relations and investigations, leave and accommodation compliance, and manager training.Clients typically call me when:‚Ä¢ HR has been ‚Äúgood enough‚Äù but a growth spurt, investigation, or agency inquiry exposes serious gaps.‚Ä¢ There is no in‚Äëhouse HR, and the owner is stuck managing employee issues, leave, and documentation late at night.‚Ä¢ A nonprofit or medical practice needs big‚Äëcompany HR rigor on a small‚Äëorganization budget.Engagements are designed to be lean and focused: I act as your on‚Äëcall HR leader, build or fix the core HR infrastructure, train your team, and leave you with systems that scale.If you are ready to stop hoping your HR is ‚Äúfine‚Äù and start knowing it is handled, send a message or visit NavigationHR to discuss a focused engagement.Curious whether your HR is quietly putting you at risk‚Äîor quietly protecting you? Visit navigationhr.com to take out "HR Health Check".
job description: Built NavigationHR from the ground up to provide small and mid-sized businesses with tailored HR strategies that keep them compliant, protect their assets, and empower their teams to perform at their best. Lead HR risk and compliance overhauls for small and mid‚Äësized employers, closing critical gaps in handbooks, I‚Äë9s, leave practices, and documentation that are exposing owners to regulatory and litigation risk. Translate complex employment law and HR requirements into simple, repeatable processes that reduced day‚Äëto‚Äëday HR firefighting and freed leaders to focus on operations and growth. Step in as on‚Äëcall HR leader for organizations without in‚Äëhouse HR, handling sensitive employee relations issues, investigations, and terminations in a way that protect the business and preserve culture. Build or rebuild core HR infrastructure (policies, job descriptions, performance processes, onboarding) so clients could scale headcount confidently instead of relying on ad hoc practices. Coach owners and managers through tough conversations and decisions, increasing their confidence and consistency while reducing the likelihood of costly missteps.

linkedin description (3): Dogs and cats and cats and dogs. We just love every little furry thing about them; from when they‚Äôre tiny and helpless, as they settle down into our hearts and homes and daily lives, to when they‚Äôre older and in need of extra care. Dogs and cats and cats and dogs. They keep us company, warm our hearts and make us laugh and laugh. And, if you‚Äôre like us, you do the very best you can for your pets; all that you can to keep them healthy, safe, active and happy. At Petcurean, we create premium quality, nutrient-rich food that‚Äôs right for pets, to help our dogs and cats get the most out of their lives with us. We always have, since day one when two good friends started a little family operation in the Fraser Valley of British Columbia, Canada. They were driven by the idea that pets deserved better: that pets deserved food that was made with the same love and care as we put into preparing meals for our own families. To this day, Petcurean remains fiercely independent and lives by the rule of quality first, pets first, without compromise. We‚Äôre pet people, pet owners, pet advocates and yes, more than a little obsessed with proper pet nutrition. You should see us when we‚Äôre talking about what recipes we should be creating; the meats, veggies and fruits we should be including; which rancher, farmer or producer we‚Äôll source from; what flavours we should be considering. It‚Äôs not enough to create a new recipe for the sake of having a new recipe; our foods have to do better than that, our foods have to help pets stay healthy and happy. Think about it; one small piece of kibble contains every ingredient‚Ä¶ the proteins, carbs and fats, the vitamins and minerals your pet needs to sustain and nourish its life. Yup. With every decision we make, every recipe we create, we put pets first. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôve always done, here at Petcurean. And, that‚Äôs what we‚Äôll always do.

summary: Most organizations are drowning in tools they don't need, solving for problems they haven't defined. I help small businesses and nonprofits get aligned before AI, build structure before scale, and create systems that serve people‚Äînot the other way around. THE PROBLEM Leaders buy systems before documenting their sales process. They buy automation before clarifying workflow. They chase AI before knowing what problems they're solving. Result? Expensive technology that creates chaos, not clarity. The tech industry profits from this confusion. I don't. ALIGNED BEFORE AI I published a book by this title because I'm tired of watching businesses waste money on premature technology. CLARITY BEFORE COMPLEXITY ‚Äì Before tools, we clarify what you're trying to accomplish. Until you can articulate this, no software will save you. STRUCTURE BEFORE SCALE ‚Äì You cannot automate chaos. If processes are broken, AI breaks them faster. We build documented workflows first, then introduce technology. HUMANS BEFORE HYPE ‚Äì AI amplifies what exists. Confused teams get more confused. Aligned teams become force multipliers. WHAT I'VE BUILT As Founder of Align & Innovate, I provide fractional Chief AI & Systems Officer services to organizations needing strategic technology leadership. Before that, I co-founded Visuals by Momo, helping 50+ nonprofits tell emotionally resonant stories through documentary productions. That taught me: the best technology means nothing if you can't tell a coherent story about what you do. I bring that lens to systems work. Every CRM, every workflow, every AI strategy‚Äîit's storytelling. I also host Visual Eyes Podcast, exploring storytelling, technology, and community impact. WHO I WORK WITH Leaders tired of tools that promise transformation but deliver headaches. Leaders ready to invest in foundational systems instead of chasing shiny objects. What I don't do: Sell software you don't need. Build AI that impresses investors but confuses teams. What I do: Ask hard questions. Design systems that reduce friction. Train teams to own tools‚Äînot be owned by them. MY CREDENTIALS ‚Ä¢ AI+ Chief AI Officer Certified ‚Ä¢ Board of Directors, HandsOn South Florida ‚Ä¢ Author: "Aligned Before AI" (Amazon, 2025) ‚Ä¢ Co-Founder, Visuals by Momo I don't sell what you don't need. I help you build what works. üìñ "Aligned Before AI" on Amazon üåê aligninnovate.com | visualsbymomo.com üìß chris@aligninnovate.com üéôÔ∏è Visual Eyes Podcast

summary: I work with organizations and leaders who are trying to do something different, whether that‚Äôs rethinking their strategy, managing change, or building teams that actually function well. My background includes senior roles in higher education, leadership at a fast-growing education technology company, and over 15 years of consulting experience across sectors. Today, I lead transform.forward, a boutique consulting firm focused on strategy, organizational effectiveness, and leadership development. Our clients include public and private universities, government agencies, nonprofits, startups, corporations, and organizations in transition. The work often involves strategic planning, executive coaching, culture audits, org structure reviews, or facilitation of retreats and team development. Before launching transform.forward full time, I served as Chief of Staff and Assistant Vice President at a large private university, where I led division-wide strategy, oversaw $75M in projects and operating budgets, and built teams and systems to support change at scale. Earlier in my career, I helped scale an education tech company through multiple mergers and acquisitions, where I led consulting and research services, integrated marketing, customer advocacy, and product marketing. I‚Äôve taught graduate courses on strategic planning, assessment, and leadership theory, and my research includes topics like gamification, student engagement, and the evolving role of Chief of Staff in complex institutions. I stay connected to the field through writing, speaking, and working directly with leaders who are trying to get unstuck and move forward with clarity.

linkedin description: At transform.forward, we specialize in guiding leaders and organizations through the complexities of change‚Äîwhether that change is within their control or not. summary: I work with leaders, teams, and cultures in mid-sized and large corporations that are experiencing increased complexity and change. Engagement is likely low and the workplace culture could feel unfocused, chaotic, and even toxic. Not surprisingly, this leads to decreased performance, the loss of top talent, and dissatisfied customers. I provide customized coaching, consulting, and leadership development programs that: ‚Ä¢ Increase leadership effectiveness ‚Ä¢ Improve team dynamics ‚Ä¢ Develop workforce competency and agility in navigating change The coaching, training, and development support increases workforce engagement, productivity, collaboration, trust, and resilience...and makes work more enjoyable and fulfilling for all. I know how to get the right things done quickly to create new levels of engagement and performance. I do this work because I‚Äôm passionate about helping people optimize both their grace and their grit to navigate and thrive through the inevitable waves of change. linkedin description (3): About Us: Cell BioEngines is a US-based clinical-stage biotechnology company pioneering off-the-shelf, allogeneic cell therapies. Leveraging blood stem cells from cords of highly compatible super-donors and powered by its proprietary STEM-Space cellular reprogramming platform, the company delivers scalable cell products with reduced risk of immune rejection. Cell BioEngines‚Äô competitive edge comes from a unique combination of a transgene-free scalable manufacturing platform enabled by advanced chemical reprogramming, rigorous HLA-guided design, and a population-informed biobank that supports broad patient coverage. Cell BioEngines lead clinical program is currently in a multi-center Phase 1b/2a trial for relapsed blood cancer patients including CAR-T cell therapy. The company emphasizes a robust, closed-loop scalable manufacturing in partnership with Miltenyi Biotec, has now entered strategic collaboration with NVIDIA to model donor HLA-screening and population aligned biobank strategy. The pipeline also includes Type 1 dendritic cell therapy for solid tumors and other first-/best-in-class immunotherapy programs. For more information, visit www.cellbioengines.com and follow us on www.twitter.com/cell_bioengines

summary: ‚ÄúNever doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.‚Äù ‚Äî Margaret Mead, American Anthropologist The impact of climate change is seen and felt all around us. Damages from severe weather events surpassed $8 billion for 2024 alone, compared to an average of $422 million/yr. between 1983 and 2008 (Insurance Bureau of Canada). The World Bank estimates that 40 percent of the global population lives in places of high vulnerability to climate change. "Business as usual" investing could put asset owners at risk of not meeting their fiduciary responsibilities, being misaligned with rapidly evolving regulations/guidelines or simply being out of touch with their stakeholders‚Äô sustainability convictions. I am the professional you can partner with and trust on your transition from the Institutional Investor you are to the Responsible Institutional Investor you aim to become. 1-Expertise and Experience: I am a qualified actuary (FCIA, FSA) and Chartered Investment Manager (CIM) with expertise in pension plan governance, funding, investing, ESG integration and management of climate-related risks and opportunities. I have 30 years of experience with global consulting firms, portfolio managers and plan sponsors. 2-Integrity and trustworthiness: As a member of the Canadian Institute of Actuaries (CIA) I adhere to strict Standards and Rules of Professional Conduct. I received the 2022 CIA President‚Äôs Award for my groundbreaking work as Chair of the Climate Change and Sustainability Committee serving the Institute‚Äôs 6,000 members. My clients value my honest communication, my creative thinking, and my rigorous analysis. I make my clients feel heard and respected. 3- Availability and affordability: You will have direct access to my in-depth knowledge of the Institutional Investment market to solve your Responsible Investment problems and challenges. I plan to manage my client load to maintain a high level of quality. My fees are affordable in comparison to large consulting firms. The following are some of the services I offer: ‚Ä¢ Education sessions for Board, management, or members ‚Ä¢ Diagnostic assessment with gap analysis vs. peers, regulations and best practice ‚Ä¢ Governance structure review ‚Ä¢ Workshop facilitation and action plan creation ‚Ä¢ Responsible Investment (RI) policy review/formulation and implementation ‚Ä¢ Climate Strategy development and implementation NEW STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP in 2025 WITH SAI Inc. summary: You're surviving, but woefully inefficient because your team lacks purpose, alignment, and accountability. Getting everyone aligned to a common goal, understanding their roles, and engaged in their work will increase productivity, longevity, and profit many fold. 3 Case Studies: -Problem: A startup was hemorrhaging cash because production was inefficient and sales were low and unprofitable. -Solution: Reorganized and focused the sales team, documented and put key processes in place, promoted key personnel from within, and added some key distribution relationships to scale most profitable products. -Result: Helped get the company into the black. https://www.hartberggrowth.com/project-portfolio/project-three-pco -Problem: A lack of clarity in vision and core values allowed for misalignment which caused turnover, consternation, and burnout among staff and clients. -Solution: Worked with leadership team to restructure the organization, document clear long- and short-term vision, and implement strategic goals. -Result: The new clarity led to a major shift in personnel and culture, allowing staff to self-select in (and out), which led to a more aligned team and "peaceful" environment. https://www.hartberggrowth.com/project-portfolio/project-two-dma -Problem: A division of a for-profit company was primed for growth but lacking clear direction, expectations, and accountability, let alone systems. -Solution: Documented key processes, achieved better system adoption, and provided strategic direction and focus. -Result: Over 20% annual growth in that division from 2018 to 2024 including COVID. https://www.hartberggrowth.com/project-portfolio/project-one-crsLearn more at www.hartberggrowth.com

summary: I‚Äôm the Founder and Managing Partner of Vantage Point Strategies, a financial strategy and advisory firm built to help ambitious founders operate with enterprise-level clarity. We specialize in FP&A, cash flow forecasting, and CFO-level advisory designed to drive sustainable growth. My background spans both regional and global financial planning and analysis, with experience at Coach (Tapestry Inc.), BNY Mellon, and Perry Ellis International, where I helped develop financial models, capital allocation strategies, and operational insights that informed executive decision-making. I founded Vantage Point Strategies with a simple mission: to bridge the gap between small business ambition and world-class financial strategy. After working in corporate FP&A, I saw firsthand how many entrepreneurs operate without the clarity that drives lasting growth. That realization shaped everything I‚Äôm building today. Now, through Vantage Point Group, I‚Äôm leading the development of a portfolio of ventures that bring together finance, strategy, and brand innovation. Each brand is built to empower leaders to think bigger, operate smarter, and move with confidence toward their vision. At my core, I‚Äôm passionate about building systems that scale, guiding founders toward better decisions, and creating businesses that stand the test of time.

I oversee interview strategy, guest selection, content direction, production vision, and overall brand positioning as the platform continues to grow.

We go beyond the polished headlines to reveal the experiences that truly define success ‚Äî the lessons learned, the challenges navigated, and the wisdom gained along the way. Our mission is to inspire, educate, and empower the next generation of builders through authentic conversations with people who have walked the path.

My work spans: Cash flow forecasting and 13-week modeling Annual budgeting and long-range planning KPI dashboards and performance analytics Capital allocation strategy Pricing, margin, and cost optimization Scenario and sensitivity modeling Operational improvement recommendations Strategic planning support for founders and leadership teams I bring global FP&A experience, corporate financial discipline, and a practical operator mindset to industries including construction, consumer goods, retail, hospitality, professional services, creative agencies, and early-stage startups.

job description (3): VantageFlow is an AI-powered FP&A and decision-intelligence platform designed to give founders and operators real-time clarity on the financial health of their business. I am leading product vision, architecture, and development for a platform that automates forecasting, KPI tracking, and scenario planning; connecting directly to accounting systems to turn raw financial data into actionable intelligence. Core focus areas include: Designing data models for automated forecasting and cash flow visibility Building a real-time KPI dashboard framework for operators Architecting multi-tenant backend infrastructure Testing ERP and accounting system integrations Developing features that surface trends, risks, and opportunities automatically Creating an intuitive UX that feels like having an in-house FP&A team on demand The platform is currently in pre-launch development with MVP and controlled beta testing underway.
linkedin description (3): Vantageflow is an AI-powered FP&A and decision-making platform built for entrepreneurs and business owners who want real-time clarity and control over their numbers. Most businesses operate without the financial visibility they need. Forecasts take too long. Dashboards are manual and scattered. Cash flow is unclear. Decisions are made without reliable data. Vantageflow changes that. The platform connects directly to accounting and operating systems and transforms raw financial data into clear insights that guide better decisions. Users get automated forecasting, real-time cash flow visibility, KPI dashboards, variance analysis, and scenario planning in one place. Vantageflow is built to help founders operate with confidence. Instead of reacting to financial surprises, business owners can anticipate challenges, plan proactively, and scale their companies with intention. We are currently in pre-launch development with our MVP and beta testing underway.

summary: Hi, I‚Äôm Carlamay Sheremata. I‚Äôm a retired police officer, keynote speaker, award-winning author, and family conflict resolution specialist‚Äîbut more than that, I‚Äôm a bridge-builder. Between systems and people. Between leaders and their teams. Between families and the youth they love. After 21 years in law enforcement‚Äîincluding 8.5 years as a School Resource Officer‚ÄîI‚Äôve seen what happens when people lose connection. I‚Äôve watched families fracture, leaders burn out, teams implode, and kids fall through the cracks. Not because people didn‚Äôt care‚Äîbut because they didn‚Äôt know how to lead through the hard stuff. That‚Äôs why I created the CALM Leadership Method‚Ñ¢‚Äîa trust-centered, emotionally intelligent approach to leadership that works in real life. Under pressure. In crisis. In the moments that matter most. I now help corporate teams, educators, frontline professionals, and families lead with connection, rebuild trust where it‚Äôs been lost, and communicate clearly when it counts most‚Äîat home, at work, and everywhere in between. Whether I‚Äôm on stage speaking to executives, equipping frontline teams, or sitting across from a family in conflict, I bring the same message: Connection heals what correction can‚Äôt. And if we don‚Äôt fix the disconnection, we lose the people who need us most. I‚Äôm also the author of the award-winning book Youth Truth: Engaging in Conversations That Can Change Lives‚Äîa raw, practical guide that equips parents, educators, and mentors to connect with today‚Äôs youth on the tough topics that matter most. It‚Äôs not just a book‚Äîit‚Äôs a bridge between generations, emotions, and relationships. Through real stories, bold truths, and actionable tools, I teach people how to lead with clarity, courage, and compassion‚Äîwithout burning out or checking out. Because when we get connection right, everything changes. What I Speak & Train On: Trust-Centered Leadership in High-Stress Environments The CALM Method‚Ñ¢: From Reactive to Regulated Leadership Building Emotionally Resilient Teams and Families The Bridge Between Home & Work: Leading from the Inside Out Youth Truth‚Ñ¢: Conversations That Reach Today‚Äôs Kids Being Pink in a Blue World: Leading Authentically in Male-Dominated Spaces Let‚Äôs connect if you‚Äôre: A leader ready to retain your people‚Äînot lose them A team burned out from constant crisis A parent, coach, or educator ready to build trust with youth An event planner looking for a speaker who brings heart, humor, and real talk A human who believes leadership starts with presence‚Äînot position Let‚Äôs rebuild trust where it matters most‚Äîtogether.
job description: Diamond in the Rough Consulting is more than a business‚Äîit‚Äôs a movement. We help leaders, teams, and families rebuild trust, lead with emotional intelligence, and reconnect where it matters most‚Äîat home, at work, and in the moments that shape everything. Founded by Carlamay Sheremata, a retired police officer, award-winning author, keynote speaker, and family conflict resolution specialist, our work is grounded in lived experience, not just theory. After 21 years on the frontlines of crisis‚Äîincluding 8.5 years as a School Resource Officer‚ÄîCarlamay created the CALM Leadership Method‚Ñ¢, a powerful, trust-centered approach that equips people to lead with clarity, connection, and courage under pressure. At Diamond in the Rough, we believe disconnection is costing us‚Äîour teams, our families, and our culture. We deliver bold keynotes, interactive workshops, and transformational training that help people communicate clearly, lead through conflict, and restore trust in high-stakes environments. Whether we‚Äôre equipping corporate leaders to retain their teams, training frontline professionals to navigate youth crisis, or guiding families through conflict resolution sessions‚Äîour approach is real, relatable, and results-driven. We don‚Äôt do surface work. We dig deep‚Äîbecause the diamond is always found in the rough. Our services include: Trust-centered keynote speaking Trauma-aware and CALM Method‚Ñ¢ leadership training Youth-focused workshops and educator engagement Customized team development for emotionally intelligent workplaces Family conflict resolution (hourly or package-based support) If you‚Äôre tired of band-aid solutions and want to create lasting change‚Äîfrom the inside out‚Äîthen you‚Äôre in the right place. Let‚Äôs rebuild what‚Äôs been broken and lead the way forward with heart, clarity, and connection. For more information on From Chaos to CALM keynotes and workshops, visit www.carlamaysheremata.com.
job description (2): Youth Truth: Engaging In Conversations That Can Change Lives üìñ Do you know what questions to ASK your kids, students, and the youth in your life to get them to talk with you? Wouldn‚Äôt it be great to have them actually respond and engage in conversation? It really is possible! In Youth Truth, you will discover how to approach the difficult topics that need to be talked about with your kids or students. You can do it with empathy and support. You can create safe spaces where youth feel valued and heard. Youth Truth can enhance your understanding of the issues that youth are dealing with these days. That way, you will know what the right questions are and the right way to ask the questions that actually touch hearts with the young people you want to reach. This gripping book delves into the raw, unfiltered world of today‚Äôs youth. Their lives are way more complex than most realize. It is a compelling and poignant exploration of the challenges faced by young souls, bringing to light the often overlooked and misunderstood battles they fight. From the haunting shadows of suicide to the insidious presence of bullying to the silent struggles of eating disorders and the desperate yearning just to be seen‚Äìthis narrative bares it all. It is a powerful testament to the resilience, strength, and untold stories of a generation yearning for understanding and compassion. More than just a collection of stories, the author, a retired law enforcement and school resource officer, delivers a call to action, emphasizing the critical need for open, honest, and compassionate conversations. Youth Truth highlights how listening and engaging in meaningful dialogue can profoundly impact the lives of young people.

linkedin description (2): Launched in 2006, Amazon Web Services (AWS) began exposing key infrastructure services to businesses in the form of web services -- now widely known as cloud computing. The ultimate benefit of cloud computing, and AWS, is the ability to leverage a new business model and turn capital infrastructure expenses into variable costs. Businesses no longer need to plan and procure servers and other IT resources weeks or months in advance. Using AWS, businesses can take advantage of Amazon's expertise and economies of scale to access resources when their business needs them, delivering results faster and at a lower cost. Today, Amazon Web Services provides a highly reliable, scalable, low-cost infrastructure platform in the cloud that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses in 190 countries around the world. With data center locations in the U.S., Europe, Singapore, and Japan, customers across all industries are taking advantage of our low cost, elastic, open and flexible, secure platform.

summary: Strategic and people-first executive with 25+ years of experience leading global executive search, talent acquisition, and operations. Known for building scalable infrastructure, aligning talent strategy with business goals, and leading high-performing, inclusive teams across North America, EMEA, and APAC. I bring a thoughtful, steady approach to leadership, creating clarity in complex environments and helping teams focus on what matters most. My experience spans high-growth and established organizations, where I have led operational transformation, introduced KPIs, standardized processes, managed $30M+ in search operations budgets, and supported global teams of 140+ professionals. I am a trusted advisor to the C-suite who brings a people-first lens to complex decisions, balancing performance, accountability, and the human impact of change. Whether building new frameworks, optimizing delivery models, or leading through M&A integrations, I balance strategic rigor with hands-on leadership and care for the human side of the work. Currently open to select advisory, interim, or fractional opportunities where I can help organizations strengthen talent infrastructure, drive efficiency, and lead with intention. For more on my leadership style, please see my recommendations below.
job description: Brightview Solutions provides leadership and executive coaching, new manager development, and talent strategy advisory services that strengthen people, teams, and organizational performance. We help leaders grow with intention, build healthier teams, and navigate change with confidence and clarity. Our work blends coaching, talent expertise, and real operational insight to support: ‚Ä¢ Senior leaders seeking stronger presence and impact ‚Ä¢ New managers stepping into leadership for the first time ‚Ä¢ Teams working through growth, transition, or cultural shifts ‚Ä¢ Organizations looking to improve engagement, retention, and performance through people-first leadership
linkedin description: Leaders in executive search and talent acquisition spend their days advising others, managing expectations, navigating pressure, and holding complex human dynamics. They are expected to be decisive, composed, and constantly available, often while absorbing stress from clients, candidates, partners, and teams. The challenge is not a lack of capability. It is the accumulation. The cost shows up as blurred priorities, reactive decision-making, leadership fatigue, and the quiet sense that there is no place to put the weight you are carrying. Leadership in talent and search can feel grounded, clear, and sustainable without losing edge, credibility, or performance. When we work together, leaders gain clearer judgment under pressure, greater confidence navigating client, candidate, and internal dynamics, and practical tools to manage complexity without constant reactivity. The result is steadiness that carries into teams, clients, and decisions. This work supports leaders who are already strong and want to lead with greater clarity, presence, and meaningful connection, particularly in complex, high-pressure environments. I have spent my career in executive search and talent acquisition. I understand the pace, the pressure, and the unspoken expectations that shape this work. My coaching blends leadership experience, talent expertise, and a structured, human-centered approach for leaders who do not need theory. They need clarity. I bring over two decades of experience working alongside senior leaders in executive search, recruiting, and people-driven organizations, including scaling and leading global search operations for a PE-backed talent advisory firm through organic and M&A growth. If this resonates with you or your team, I invite you to schedule a confidential conversation to explore whether coaching support would be useful right now.
linkedin specialities: Executive Coaching, Leadership Development, Recruiting, Recruiting Operations, Executive Search, Talent Acquisition

Yet they are managing employee issues complex compliance decisions and leadership challenges every day. That is where we step in as your Fractional HR partner. We bring clarity support and structure so you can lead with confidence. We develop leaders and teams because the way people lead matters. It impacts how people engage how they perform and how long they stay. Our leadership development experiences are built for real world application. We make learning human relevant and transformational. We coach executives because influence starts inside. When a leader grows everything around them grows too. With more than 100 years of combined experience our team brings depth heart and strategic thinking to every organization we serve. We care deeply about the people inside the business because business results are a reflection of the people driving them. We are not just HR. We are human power at work. linkedin description (4): The American Nicaraguan School (ANS) is a non-profit, non-sectarian, coeducational day school founded in 1944 to provide a college preparatory American educational program from Nursery (Kindergarten age 3) through Grade 12 for students of all nationalities. The School is governed by a 7 member Board of Directors, with 6 members elected by school parents, and one member appointed by the U.S. Embassy. The school community includes members of the diplomatic corps, foreign and local businesses, Nicaraguan government and various international assistance groups working in Nicaragua. The ANS Mission is to provide its multicultural student community with a US-accredited college preparatory program, based on democratic and universal values, that develops critical thinkers and ethical individuals capable of realizing their leadership potential by making meaningful contributions to society. As an AdvancED accredited institution, ANS follows a US-based curriculum while also providing students the opportunity of obtaining the Nicaraguan Bachillerato Diploma. English is the language of instruction through all grade levels, starting in Kinder 3. An innovative approach to education starts early at ANS through Balanced Literacy, Singapore Math and Science Fusion being implemented in the Early Learning Center and Elementary School. Middle School and High School students incorporate technology use in their lessons through the One-to-One Laptop Program. Secondary School students apply their skills through involvement in both curricula and extra-curricular activities. Students challenge themselves by taking classes from the Global Studies Academy Program, picking up a third or fourth language, as well as choosing from 16 academically diverse AP courses, adding to their preparation for attending colleges and universities in the United States and around the world. For information on employment opportunities visit: www.ans.edu.ni/employment/

education school linkedin description (2: Though the emergence of Hamdard University on the educational scene of Pakistan is in a fledgling stage yet the evolution it has witnessed thus far sets the trend that others are trying to replicate. The University does not want to rest on its laurels and therefore strives hard for further growth and maturity in order to be at par with renowned universities in the region. The Main Campus of Hamdard University at Madinat al-Hikmah is spread over a picturesque landscape and is located in the vicinity of Sindh Balochistan border 8 km from the commercial center of the metropolis, on the main highway leading to Bund Murad Khan. The location of the campus is of great historical and geographical significance. It lies on the main highway, which connects it to the Hub Chowki on the highway to Quetta, and is situated along the Hub River on the borders of Sindh and Baluchistan. The site, according to the renowned historians and archaeologists, is the place where Muhammad Bin Qasim, who made Sindh the gateway of Islam in the sub-continent, landed on his way to Daibal. The Campus is also closer to yet another celebrated site i.e. the shrine of Shah Noorani in Lasbela, Balochistan. Access to the university has been further strengthened for the people of the South West and North due to the completion of Northern By-pass which connects the Super Highway to Hamdard University on one hand and with Balochistan on the other.

summary: I‚Äôve spent my entire career inside HR. But the people I care about most aren‚Äôt sitting in corporate boardrooms. They‚Äôre running skilled trades and service businesses. They‚Äôre out in the field early, managing crews, juggling schedules, solving problems in real time ‚Äî and doing everything they can to keep the work moving and their people supported. And almost every one of them has said some version of the same thing to me: ‚ÄúI know HR matters‚Ä¶ I just don‚Äôt have the time. And honestly, I‚Äôm not even sure where to start.‚Äù That‚Äôs exactly why I founded On Demand HR Solutions. Small, growing trades businesses don‚Äôt need corporate HR theory or overbuilt policies that don‚Äôt fit how the work actually gets done. They need simple, practical HR support ‚Äî delivered in a way that works alongside the business, not on top of it. That‚Äôs where I come in. I work as an independent on-demand HR partner for skilled trades businesses, and I offer a few clear ways to get support, depending on what you need right now: HR SOS Session A focused, one-hour working session to tackle one specific HR issue ‚Äî a people problem, compliance question, hiring concern, or ‚Äúthis just came up and I need help‚Äù situation. HR Blueprint A short-term, hands-on engagement to put the HR foundations in place ‚Äî clear policies, better hiring and onboarding, and simple systems that bring structure and consistency to how you manage your crew. HR Advisory Ongoing HR support for owners who want a trusted partner in their corner ‚Äî someone they can call, message, or loop in when questions come up, decisions need to be made, or issues start to surface. No over-engineered solutions. No corporate speak. No judgment. Just honest, practical HR support designed for businesses where the work happens in the field. I believe HR should make running a business easier ‚Äî not harder. If you‚Äôre not sure which option makes sense, that‚Äôs okay. Most people aren‚Äôt. Send me a message here on LinkedIn and tell me what‚Äôs going on. I‚Äôll help you figure out the simplest next step. üì• Message me on LinkedIn ‚Äî I‚Äôm just one DM away.
job description: After more than 30 years leading HR in complex corporate environments, I started noticing a pattern. Small, growing skilled trades businesses were being asked to manage the same HR responsibilities: hiring, onboarding, safety, compliance, employee issues ‚Äî without the time, support, or internal HR teams that larger companies rely on. Most owners don't want to ‚Äúdo HR.‚Äù They just wanted the work to run smoothly, their crews supported, and their business protected. So I founded On Demand HR Solutions to meet them where they are. Today, I work as an on-demand HR partner for skilled trades and field-based businesses, helping owners put practical HR systems in place that actually work in real life. My focus is HR operations and people management that supports how trades businesses run day to day. That includes everything from hiring and onboarding crews, to setting clear expectations, handling employee issues, and staying compliant as the business grows. I step in where HR usually falls through the cracks and help bring structure, clarity, and consistency without overcomplicating things. What this looks like in practice: - Acting as the HR department for small trades businesses, providing on-demand guidance, HR administration, and compliance support - Supporting owners through sensitive employee relations issues with a balance of compassion, clarity, and compliance - Building right-sized HR foundations ‚Äî handbooks, policies, onboarding processes, and basic systems that crews can actually follow - Providing fractional or interim HR support when a business needs experienced HR leadership without hiring full-time - Helping owners move from reactive, day-to-day people issues to more stable, repeatable ways of managing their teams This work allows me to do what I care about most: Making HR feel manageable for business owners who already have enough on their plates ‚Äî and helping trades businesses grow without the constant stress of ‚Äúfiguring it out as they go.‚Äù
linkedin description: Are you trying to run your business but constantly pulled into HR tasks you didn‚Äôt sign up for? Writing policies, handling employee issues, figuring out compliance... it‚Äôs not why you started your business. But it is what keeps you up at night. And if you‚Äôre nodding along, then we might be a great fit. üëã Hi, I‚Äôm Norma. Founder of On Demand HR Solutions, and your go-to partner for real, reliable, roll-up-my-sleeves HR support. I‚Äôve spent 30+ years working in corporate HR at every level, from frontline operations to executive leadership. I‚Äôve built HR functions from the ground up, navigated mergers and acquisitions, led compliance strategies, and supported thousands of employees across industries. Today, I help small business owners who don‚Äôt have an HR department, but need one. You're growing but overwhelmed. You want structure without red tape. You need support that fits your business‚Äînot the other way around. That‚Äôs where I come in. At On Demand HR Solutions, I provide: - Fractional HR leadership & strategy - Custom employee handbooks & policy development - Employee relations & compliance guidance - Onboarding, payroll processing & admin support - Ongoing advisory‚Äîvia email, Voxer, or Zoom Whether you‚Äôre onboarding your first employee or navigating a tricky situation, I help you handle it well, legally, and in a way that aligns with your values and meets you where you're at now. My clients range from 1 employee to growing teams of 20+. Some need a long-term partner. Others need a one-off project done right. Either way, they know I‚Äôll bring calm, clarity, and real results. üí¨ Let's talk. Here's how we can work together: 1. Free 30-minute consultation ‚Äì Let‚Äôs explore your HR needs. 2. Monthly support packages ‚Äì Ongoing HR help without full-time cost. 3. Project-based solutions ‚Äì Handbooks, audits, policy revamps & more. job description (2): While my title at Integra LifeSciences changed over 16 years, the constant was transformation. Integra‚Äôs growth-by-acquisition strategy meant the business‚Äîand HR‚Äîwere always evolving. Every acquisition brought new people, systems, and challenges, giving me the opportunity to reinvent HR over and over again. It often felt like working for a dozen companies within one. In my final role as Head of Global HR Service Delivery, I built and led what became the one-stop-shop for employee support across payroll, benefits, onboarding, leave of absence, employee relations and more. I launched ServiceNow globally, to streamline employee inquiries, reducing response times to under 24 hours, and creating a single source of truth for HR processes. This work supported a dynamic, fast-scaling organization where clear, efficient HR processes were critical. But beyond the systems and processes, what I‚Äôm most proud of is how we made HR approachable again‚Äîturning a fragmented, confusing experience into one where employees felt supported and leaders had the tools they needed to lead confidently. Earlier, as Head of HR for Corporate Functions, I served as the executive HR partner to C-Suite Finance, IT, Legal, Business Development, and Scientific leaders‚Äîsupporting them through organization design, restructuring, and workforce planning. I helped leaders build talent strategies, navigate organizational changes, and integrate acquired teams seamlessly into the business.
